title: Langkah Pencegahan Virus Corona di Lingkungan Kerja - CNN Indonesia
description: Kantor adalah ruang lingkup yang memungkinkan penularan virus corona lantaran mobilitas orang yang tinggi. Itu sebab perlu antisipasi.

author: Grace MacRae
title: Britain on the BRINK: 1,500 people tested for coronavirus in ONE day as disease takes hold - Express.co.uk
description: CORONAVIRUS fears are at an all time high after 1,500 Brits were tested for the deadly virus in the space of one day. Now experts fear the NHS could be faced with major problems controlling the virus in the future.
